content: The Swedish survey results translation is done. Link in the coordination doc.

I noticed a quirk in the Swedish results. The English version of the Survey has that note about the google survey engine having a bug, so one should only click the radio buttons once. Well, unfortunately I missed that change so it wasn't in the translation. :/ A few results have multiple entries, which I assume is a side effect of people not knowing about this glitch. Not sure how to handle it. How was this handled when it was first discovered?
